summary: Retextured eyes for Human races (male and female)
descriptionHtml:
==VERSION 2.0==
I equalized out the eye saturations so that the eyes no longer look so \'glowy\' based on user feedback. The eyes should be bright but appear natural.

Description:
Just some simple retextures of the eyes for Human races. Works for both Male and female.
I felt like the original eye textures were a bit bland so I tried to make them more colorful.

Install:
Extract zip to your Data directory.
author: lordvitiris
